openGraph.title: C++ Beginner & Advanced Courses | Coding Blocks
openGraph.description: Learn the most required language in Industry- Python right from the basics and become an accomplished programmer, one of the most popular programming languages in the world and brighten your chances of making it to the Top Tech organisations as an Intern or SDE.

overview.content:
This Python training course is designed to provide you with a platform from where you can start your journey in the amazing world of programming and software. The beginner's course will include programming fundamentals using C++, Loops, Functions, Arrays, Stacks, Queues, Linked List.

The advanced course is for all those who are looking forward to sit for internships and placements. The course will involve rigorous practice of questions based on Sorting, Searching, Greedy Algorithms, Divide and Conquer Algorithms, Dynamic Programming along with comprehensive revision of data structures like linked-lists, Trees, Graphs, Heaps, Hashing etc.

The course will help you become smarter with solutions and ace your programming interviews. C++ is known to be a very powerful language. It allows you to have a lot of control as to how you use computer resources effectively and efficiently better than other languages. Thanks to C++'s performance, it is often used to develop game engines, games, and desktop apps. As a statically typed language, C++ generally does better than dynamically typed languages because the code is type-checked before it is executed. Companies like Google and Facebook, also need C++ developers to optimize their apps or work on their products.

syallabus.title: Basics
syallabus.sectionDescription: Learn how to get started with programming and building logic using pseudocode and flowchart.

syallabus.title: Functions
syallabus.sectionDescription: Learn how to write basic syntax and use loops. We will learn how to reduce repetition of code using Functions.

syallabus.title: Builtin Data Structures
syallabus.sectionDescription: We will learn to use arrays, Sorting and Searching algorithms like Bubble, Selection and Insertion Sort.
sectionContent: Comprehension of Data Structure in Python

syallabus.title: Object Oriented Programming Modules
syallabus.sectionDescription: It is one of the most important topics in programming, we learn the functioning of recursive function calls and in-depth understanding of comparing algorithms via Time and Space complexity.

syallabus.title: File & Error Handling
syallabus.sectionDescription: Learn about Object Oriented Programming, and get started with basic Data Structures LinkedList, Stack and Queue.

syallabus.title: Iteration Protocol and Generators
syallabus.sectionDescription: Learn the most asked problems in the Interviews from Bit Masking & DNC, here we solve the problems asked in companies like Google, Amazon, Microsoft etc.

syallabus.title: Asynchronous Programming in Python
syallabus.sectionDescription: Learn the most important part of the Technical and Interview rounds. We cover each and every data structure in depth along with the algorithms complexity analysis, also STL of each DS is discussed.

mentors.name: Shubham Singhal
mentors.description: Shubham is a Masters in AI specialization from IIIT-Delhi. He is well versed in Java and Python coding languages as well as highly proficient in Data Structures and Algorithm. As a Data Science and machine learning enthusiast, he has deep knowledge about this field. He also published a paper related to Machine Learning in iconip conference.

courseHighlights.title: Fundamentals
courseHighlights.content: We have designed our C++ fundamentals course keeping in mind the requirements of beginners. Course starts with fundamentals of logic building and problem solving. Many tricky Puzzles are also given to build logical thinking of our students.

courseHighlights.title: Problem Solving
courseHighlights.content: The C++ course is designed to sharpen the problem solving skills, using C++, of the students. We follow step-by-step approach to make students fall in love with programming and ignite their passion of coding with the help of problems ranging to easy to intermediate to expert level.

courseHighlights.title: OOP Concepts & Project
courseHighlights.content: Emphasis is given on building strong Object Oriented Programming Concepts and coding practices followed in the Software Industry, so to make our students industry-ready C++ coders.

courseHighlights.title:
Data Structures 
& Algorithms
courseHighlights.content: This course entails more than 100 hours of teaching and hands on C++ coding. Students will be solving more than 200 complex problems in C++ and will be evaluated for their problem solving skills and understanding of data structures throughout the course.

faqs.ans: Anybody who is interested in learning C++ programming can do this course. C++ is a powerful language and is pretty easy to learn. Coding in its most essential form is nothing but problem solving. It deals with figuring out logical solutions and implementing them optimally. The process of learning to code transforms a person into an analytical thinker with strong mathematical and logical skills.

faqs.ques: Will this course help if I had C++ in class 12?
faqs.ans: Yes, absolutely. There is a lot more to learn in C++ than the school curriculum.

faqs.ques: I didn’t have C++ in class 12 ? Can I do this course ?
faqs.ans: Yes. Our instructors will start the C++ course from beginner's level. You don’t need any prior programming knowledge to attend this course. What we need is dedication and passion to learn programming from your side.
